name: Days Inn Montrose

reviews.text: I decided to try this place, as the previous tripadvisor review had been neutral, but other websites carried more encouraging reviews.
reviews.title: Terrific value if you have a limited budget

reviews.text: All my comments are to be taken in the context of a room rate of $34+tax. Room is pretty good, fixtures mostly not new, and the bath and toilet seat have seen better days. The room is quite light at night - lots of strong lighting outside makes it look good at dusk from the exterior, and helps with security - but quite a lot of light percolates around the curtains, which isn't great if you are a light sleeper. It's on with those eyeshades for me.
reviews.title: This budget motel could be VERY good, if........

likes.disliked: — not enough toilet paper; no decaf; opened lotion

description: In the Heart of Montrose, and just 5 miles from the airport, The Days Inn is the perfect home away from home. The beautiful 70 room property is just minutes away from Colorado most beautiful landscape—Grand Mesa features over 250 lakes, Gunnison Nation Park, Ridgeway Park, Box Canyon Falls. The rooms at the Days inn give you the felling of home and family, with our tropical outdoor pool and hot tub and homemade cookies every evening in our lobby, the free high speed internet, Complimentary USA Today, and Work desk make it perfect for business travelers. Start your day with our complimentary deluxe breakfast with fresh local fruit, Biscuits and gravy, Waffles, healthy granola cereal and oatmeal. We also allow pets.
